Rial bụ ego nke obodo Morocco n'agbata n’ime afọ 1882 na 1921
E kewara ya na dirham iri, nke ọ bụla n'ime mazuna iri ise.
E webatara rial mgbe Obodo Morocco nakweere ụdị mkpụrụ ego nke oge a na afo 1882
Ọ nọchiri usoro nke nwere falus ọla kọpa, dirham ọlaọcha na benduqi ọlaedo.
Na Spanish Morocco, e ji peseta Spanish dochie anya rial na afo 1912 na ọnụego nke otu rial =  pesetas ise
Na obodo French Morocco, a gbanwere rial na afo 1921 site na franc na ọnụego nke otu rial =  francs iri.
N'afọ 1882, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha ⁄, , 2 1⁄2 na 5 dirham na 1 rial ebe, n'afọ 1902, e webatara ọla nchara máximas otu, abuo, ise na iri
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ọtụtụ mgbanwe nhazi, okpukpe ndị a nọgidere na-agbanwe agbanwe ruo n’afo 1921.
Nanị ego akwụkwọ e wepụtara nke a na-akpọ rial bụ nke ndi State Bank of Morocco wepụtara n'etiti afo 1910 na 1917
A na-akpọkwa ndị a na francs, na okpukpu nke rials ano (francs iri ano) na rials iri abuo (francs nari abuo).
